name: Darkness and light (Bromley9)
description: You are a prisoner alone who has been locked away for too long in this research facility, a  vast system of cells that you can’t remember who your family was but you are losing your identity due to a constant barrage of  mind altering chemicals and continual torture by Warden Jamieson who can’t get enough of hearing you scream. You need to escape this oppressive regime before its too late.
